greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of alternating sum transform (PSumSIGN) of Harmonic numbers H(n) = A001008/A002805.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
formula: G.f. for A035048(n)/A035047(n) : log(1-x)/(x^2-1). - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jun 15 2003
a(n) = denominator((-1)^(n+1)*1/2*(log(2)+(-1)^(n+1)*(gamma+1/2*(psi(1+n/2)-psi(3/2+n/2))+psi(2+n)))), with gamma the Euler-Mascheroni constant. - [_Gerry Martens_, Apr 28 2011]
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
